name: Environaut\PharCompiler
short_desc: This class compiles all necessary files of Environaut to an executable environaut.phar file that may be executed directly (run standalone).

create.name: create
create.short_desc: Creates a PHP archive file with all files necessary to run Environaut standalone.

phar_path.name: phar_path
phar_path.short_desc: full path to the php archive file to create
